entities.name: colin creevey
entities.description: Colin Creevey is described as being petrified and having his eyes wide open. He is also holding a camera in front of him.

entities.name: madam pomfrey
entities.description: Madam Pomfrey is described as whispering to Professor McGonagall about Colin being petrified.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is described as saying that Colin is petrified and asking Dumbledore what the melted camera means.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is described as leaning forward to prise the camera out of Colin's grip and then prising open the back of the camera.

entities.name: albus
entities.description: Albus is mentioned as being on his way downstairs for hot chocolate when he might have been attacked.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as catching the acrid smell of burnt plastic from three beds away.

relationships.description: Colin and Madam Pomfrey stared down at Colin together.
Dumbledore prised the camera out of Colin's rigid grip.
Professor McGonagall asked Dumbledore what the melted camera means.
